### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients ( 
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  patient_name VARCHAR(50), 
  date_of_birth DATE, 
  medical_history TEXT, 
  prescriptions TEXT 
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE PatientInformation (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5),
  medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Prescriptions (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medicine_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  frequency VARCHAR(20),
  date_prescribed DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientInformation(patient_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_id = 1;

);

);

CREATE TABLE Prescriptions (

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1)
);


CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(200),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);


CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  prescription_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1)
);


CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(200),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  prescription_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM medical_history WHERE DATE_FORMAT(treatment,'%Y-%m')='2022-01');
